name: sonder socks
notes:
sonder socks is a basic cuff-down sock recipe that provides instructions for incorporating contrast heels and toes using your favourite mini-skeins. 

it also includes directions for two different rib treatments at the cuff as well as options for working the leg and top of foot in stockinette or in a simple 3 x 1 rib. 

whether you're a beginner or more experienced sock knitter, this pattern makes a great canvas for playing with colour or even trying out your own stitch and texture ideas to create your own unique design!

*note that a basic cast on calculation along with toe-shaping information by shoe size makes it easy to adapt this pattern to your knitting gauge and foot size.*

**find sonder sock sets** [here][1].
**find sonder yak sock sets** [here][2].
